title: Algorithmic Bias â€“ Diskriminierung durch Algorithmen erkennen und vermeiden
abstract: Misogynist chatbots, racist image classification, discriminating recruiting tools: Despite being based on mathematical logic, AI applications have shown a significant amount of bias. With the rise of AI we have the chance to make implicit bias visible and measurable. In this talk, I will present the most common issues and discuss some ways to overcome bias. ...
